LanguageData.DiscoverAncientComplex.label: discover ancient complex
LanguageData.DiscoverAncientComplex.effectDesc: you will discover the location of an ancient complex nearby.
LanguageData.DiscoverAncientComplex.letterInfoText: You've discovered the location of an ancient complex.
LanguageData.FarmAnimalsWanderIn.label: farm animals wander in
LanguageData.FarmAnimalsWanderIn.effectDesc: a group of farm animals will be attracted and join the colony.
LanguageData.FarmAnimalsWanderIn.letterInfoText: Curious farm animals have wandered in, attracted by the commotion.
LanguageData.GauranlenTreePod.label: gauranlen pod sprout
LanguageData.GauranlenTreePod.effectDesc: a Gauranlen pod will sprout at a random location on the map, if it can.
LanguageData.InsectJellyTunnels.label: insect jelly
LanguageData.InsectJellyTunnels.effectDesc: insect jelly deposits will be deposited from underground.
LanguageData.InsectJellyTunnels.letterInfoText: A giant insect colony underground has deposited some insect jelly.
LanguageData.NearbyFactionGoodwill.label: nearby faction goodwill
LanguageData.NearbyFactionGoodwill.effectDesc: you will gain goodwill from the nearest faction base.
LanguageData.RandomRecruit.label: random recruit
LanguageData.RandomRecruit.effectDesc: 50% chance of random recruit of the same ideoligion joining your colony.
LanguageData.RandomRecruit.letterInfoText: A wanderer has arrived and wants to join your colony.
